title: [1.6.X-1.10.2]Leather Smelting Mod 腐肉冶炼皮革 ———— 不杀牛牛君也能得皮革咯
author: 我如黑日

replies.author: 青木源
replies.txt_content:
标题: [1.6.X-1.10.2]Leather Smelting Mod 腐肉冶炼皮革 ———— 不杀牛牛君也能得皮革咯 本帖最后由 XIAOMM 于 2016-8-31 16:36 编辑 

 介绍
Adds a crafting recipe that allows you to craft 5x Rotten Flesh into 1x Patchwork Flesh, and a smelting recipe that allows you to smelt Patchwork Flesh into Leather. Experience gained from smelting is 0.35, equivalent to cooking raw beef into steak.Also optionally (disabled by default) adds a single smelting recipe that allows you to smelt Rotten Flesh directly into Leather. Experience gained from smelting is the minimum allowed (0.1, same as Cobblestone --> Stone). Turn this on in YALSM.cfg if you want it.Versions for 1.8 and above need airbreathercore.If you're on Forge 1.9, check the Forge build number to figure out what version I'm officially supporting (this matters more for airbreathercore, and mainly just if you use YAFM too, but nonetheless this is how I've tested it):Builds 1804 and below require no higher than version 2.1.5 of YALSM, and no higher than 1.0.1 of airbreathercore.
Builds 1805 and above (tested up to 1865) require no lower than version 2.1.6 of YALSM, and no lower than 1.0.2 of airbreathercore. 大意翻译如下
5个腐肉可合成一个湿皮革湿皮革烧制后成为皮革
广大不喜爱杀害小动物的朋友的好伴侣

1.7以上的版本需一个前置同在下方下载1.6不用

 图片 下载

前置原帖下载模组原帖下载
国内网盘前置1.7.101.8.X1.9.X-1.10.2模组已汉化1.6.X1.7.X1.8.X1.9.X-1.10.2
 THE END
